mapper.select: select id from onboarding_config where region_id = #{regionId} and disabled is false limit 1

select oc.id, oc."name", oc.region_id, s.id as stage_id, s.title as stage_title , s.description as stage_description, s."order" as stage_order from ( select id, "name", region_id from onboarding_config where id = #{id} and disabled is false ) oc left join stage s on s.onboarding_config_id = oc.id and s.disabled is false order by s."order"

select fe.id, fe."label", fe.placeholder, fe.required, fe.required_text, fe.property, fe."order", et."name" as "type", fo.id as fo_id, fo.display_name as fo_label, fo.value as fo_value, fo.img_url as fo_img_url, fo."order" as fo_order from form_element fe left join element_type et on et .id = fe.type_id left join form_option fo on fo.form_element_id = fe.id and fo.disabled is false where fe.stage_id = #{stageId} and fe.disabled is false and fe.conditional is false order by fe."order", fo."order"
